resources.string: Here you will be able to improve your knowledge of geography and finger out a plenty of details and mere of this outstanding subject.
You will have 3 hp as long as you have 3 mistakes the level will be lost.\nOf course you are able to retry the level.\nThe points those you score will be saved.
Develop and practise your knowledge of geography. Enjoy!
